Articles.Content:
I have just gotten around to getting the full KSP after playing with the trial and am kicking myself for not getting it earlier..

I got it through steam and hopefully after i finish setting up my laptop (i5,8Gb, gt640m) to dual boot linux I'll swap to running it on that..

Now to decide what mods to use, I've been playing stock career so far and loving it...

Rocko

Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Glad to hear you've been enjoying the game. Feel free to ask questions, share your achievements, or just generally talk about what you like most about the game. That's what we're here for.

Incidentally, how's the weather down on the other side of the world been lately?
Welcome aboard! There's plenty of stuff to do on the forums, and there's no shortage of mods, either!
How do you Australians manage not falling of the globe? ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> How do you Australians manage not falling of the globe? ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

The Australians would ask the same of us Topsiders. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Hey mate. Grab a tinny, you're gonna be stuck here a while ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
